HOME_DELIVERY.pricing:
Česká pošta: 89 Kč (zdarma při objednávce nad 900,- Kč)
PPL: 79 Kč (zdarma při objednávce nad 900,- Kč)
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Následující pracovní den po podání zásilky.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing:
PPL Parcel Shop: 49 Kč (zdarma při objednávce nad 900,- Kč)
Zásilkovna: 55 Kč (zdarma při objednávce nad 900,- Kč)

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Kosmas.cz provides home delivery, parcel shop delivery, and in-store pickup. PROVIDERS: Home delivery is handled by Česká pošta and PPL. Parcel shop options include PPL Parcel Shop and Zásilkovna. In-store pickup is available at 35 Kosmas bookstores. PRICING: Home delivery costs 79-89 Kč, and parcel shop delivery is 49-55 Kč. All shipping methods are free for orders over 900 Kč. In-store pickup is always free. COD surcharges are 39 Kč for delivery services and 49 Kč for payment upon in-store pickup. DELIVERY TIME: Home delivery is typically the next working day after dispatch. NOTABLE FEATURES: The free shipping threshold of 900 Kč is a key benefit. Standard home delivery is fast (next working day). A wide network of 35 physical stores for free pickup is available. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is clearly presented in a table on a dedicated page, making it easy to compare costs, providers, and free shipping limits. The information is comprehensive and user-friendly.
